cause.description:
This is a group to end the exploitation of the people by Exxon-Mobil who continually raise gas prices, making gas unaffordable.
http://www.exxposeexxon.org/whyexxon.html
http://www.exxposeexxon.com/facts/FAQ_7-06.pdf
"It is estimated that Exxon-Mobil produces as much as five percent of the world's global warming pollution."
1. Boycott Exxon into lowering gas prices
2. Boycott Exxon into developing methods of lowering global warming
cause.name: Boycott Exxon-Mobil Oil
